caption: Tunnel Activity
description: Tunnel Activity events report secure tunnel establishment (such as VPN), teardowns, renewals, and other network tunnel specific actions.
name: tunnel_activity

99.caption: Other
99.description: The event activity is not mapped. See the activity_name attribute, which contains a data source specific value.

dst_endpoint.description: The server responding to the tunnel connection.

device.description: The device that reported the event.

protocol_name.caption: Tunnel Protocol
protocol_name.description: The networking protocol associated with the tunnel. E.g. IPSec, SSL, GRE.

src_endpoint.description: The initiator (client) of the tunnel connection.

session.caption: Tunnel Session
session.description: The session associated with the tunnel.

traffic.description: Traffic refers to the amount of data moving across the tunnel at a given point of time. Ex: bytes_in and bytes_out.

tunnel_interface.caption: Tunnel Interface
tunnel_interface.description: The information about the virtual tunnel interface, e.g. utun0. This is usually associated with the private (rfc-1918) ip of the tunnel.

user.description: The user associated with the tunnel activity.
